name: Escape the Traps
description:
"Escape the Traps" is an addictive and challenging game that puts your skills and reflexes to the test.

In this game, you take on the role of a cube that moves chaotically and unpredictably.

Your mission is to guide the cube across the platform, avoiding pits and traps along the way. As you progress through the game, the platform becomes increasingly challenging, with obstacles and traps appearing more frequently and in more difficult configurations. You'll need to use your quick thinking and lightning-fast reflexes to keep the cube safe and guide it as far as possible to create new records.

With its simple but addictive gameplay, "Escape the Traps" is a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat for hours on end. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the world of mobile gaming, this game is sure to provide hours of fun and excitement.

Game Features :
- 30 character skins
- Endless level
- Daily reward
